channel.title: WatchOS on S/1999 U 2
channel.description: Recent content in WatchOS on S/1999 U 2

item.title: Important Carrier Message
item.description: Important Carrier Message Hmm, okay. Not sure what to do with this. My iPhone didn’t show anything, for sure. Apple Watch showing it’s limitations once again.

item.title: Apple Watch Update
item.description: Apple Watch Update You can resume the download when you are connected to a Wi-Fi network. Ookay… So is the Watch app broken and unwilling to update. Or is my iPhone lying to me and I’m not connected to Wi-Fi? Apple Watch requires Wi-Fi to update.
